mapper.select: SELECT M.M_NO , MT.MT_NO MT_NO , MT.MT_NAME MT_NAME , M.M_ID , M.M_PWD , M.M_NAME , M.M_PHONE , M.M_EMAIL , M.M_POSTCODE , M.M_ROADADDRESS , M.M_DETAILADDRESS , M.M_ENROLL_DATE , M.M_MODIFY_DATE , M.M_LOGIN_FAIL_COUNT , M.M_IS_LOCK , M.M_LATEST_TRY_LOGIN_DATE , M.M_LOCK_COUNT , M.M_STATUS , M.M_TEMP_PWD_YN , MR.M_NO REF_MEMBER_NO , MR.A_CODE REF_AUTHORITY_CODE , A.A_CODE , A.A_NAME , A.A_DESC FROM MEMBER M LEFT JOIN MEMBER_TYPE MT ON(M.MT_NO = MT.MT_NO) LEFT JOIN MEMBER_ROLE MR ON(M.M_NO = MR.M_NO) LEFT JOIN AUTHORITY A ON(MR.A_CODE = A.A_CODE) WHERE M.M_ID = #{userId}

SELECT IM.IM_NO , IM.IM_ID , IM.IM_PWD , IM.IM_NAME , MR.IM_NO REF_MANAGER_NO , MR.A_CODE REF_AUTHORITY_CODE , A.A_CODE , A.A_NAME , A.A_DESC FROM INFO_MANAGER IM LEFT JOIN MANAGER_ROLE MR ON(IM.IM_NO = MR.IM_NO) LEFT JOIN AUTHORITY A ON(MR.A_CODE = A.A_CODE) WHERE IM.IM_ID = #{id}
mapper.update: UPDATE MEMBER SET M_IS_LOCK = 'Y' , M_LATEST_TRY_LOGIN_DATE = SYSDATE WHERE M_ID = #{id}
